mapper.sql: id, `name`, description, create_time, create_id, update_id, update_time, `status`
mapper.insert:
insert into t_role (`name`, description, create_time, create_id, update_id, update_time, `status`) values
(#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
